caption.p: Annual variations in: the tree ring cellulose stable carbon isotope (δ 13Cc, polyline) record for P. orientalis, the tree ring whole wood stable carbon isotope (δ 13C w, circles) record for P. orientalis, and the atmospheric stable carbon isotope (δ 13C a, dotted line) between 1880 and 2014. We connected the annual δ 13Cc points to a polyline, for convenient comparison with δ 13C w.
